original_text: There are many, many browny jobs on the line; if ( I'm one of them ) don't become President. A slow boat back to their root's. Clinton loves to surround herself with her bro's and sisters, not that white trash. And I seem to remember America intervening in elections abroad? The CIA throwing money at the candidate that was pro-American? What is good of us, is not good for them? Nothing more than a ploy by ( stay at home and bake cookies ) Clinton, to discredit Trump.
adversarial_text: There are many, many brown jobs on the line; if I'm one of them, I'd advise against a presidential run. A slow boat back to their roots might be in order. Clinton tends to surround herself with family, which isn't exactly a diverse group. I recall America intervening in foreign elections, with the CIA providing financial support to pro-American candidates. It seems what's good for us isn't good for them. This whole thing feels like a ploy by Clinton to discredit Trump. It's almost as if she's trying to make us stay at home and bake cookies while she does the dirty work.

original_text:
So you want Canada to become the repository for criminals, fugitives, all the scum of the Earth, no questions asked?
How enlightened of you.
Are you maybe one of those?
adversarial_text:
So you want Canada to be a haven for those with questionable pasts, no strings attached?
Pretty enlightened of you, I suppose.
Are you perhaps one of those yourself?

original_text: True, but not as much as the shitheads who pack illegals into a hot trailer and drive them to their deaths.  I have driven for hire and I ALWAYS knew my cargo, as you are required to have shipping papers/bill of lading for what you are transporting.  I was hauling explosives, and radioactive materials, so I know what is required.  This driver was a human smuggler.  He knew what his cargo was. HE AND THE COMPANY HE WORKED FOR IS RESPONSIBLE.  PERIOD.
adversarial_text: True, but not as much as the individuals who prioritize profits over human lives. I've driven for hire and always ensured I knew my cargo, thanks to shipping papers and bills of lading. I've even hauled hazardous materials, so I understand the necessary protocols. This driver, however, was a human smuggler who knowingly transported people. He and his company share the blame. Period.

original_text: Carl Z. is so stuck on stupid.  Trump and Duterte are "two of a kind" because Trump wants to meet with him?  What a Bozo.  Oh, Obama talks with the mullahs in Iran and gives them $150 Billion and that's OK.  Never mind Iran is the world's largest state sponsor of terror.
adversarial_text: Carl Z. seems to be stuck on some outdated views. Trump and Duterte's relationship is certainly... interesting, given Trump's eagerness to meet with him. Meanwhile, Obama's diplomatic efforts with Iran, including a $150 billion package, are often overlooked. It's worth noting that Iran is a significant state sponsor of terrorism, yet this aspect of the situation rarely gets mentioned.

original_text: Nobody is worried about the Trump character. Cut the crap, dummy.  Except for  insane leftists lunatics like you and your friends - political hacks who are pretending to be journalists.
adversarial_text: Honestly, nobody seems to care about Trump's antics. But hey, if you're into that sort of thing, go ahead and defend him. I'm sure you'll fit right in with the rest of the "concerned citizens" who actually know what's going on.

original_text: Get a clue.  Our governor is the coward.  Money coming in the door from oil revenues drops by over 50%.  So the state budget should be cut by 50%.  But our coward governor doesn't do the tough job of cutting state fat.  Instead he steals $1100 from every Alaskan to fund the fat.  And then he tours Assembly meetings playing the victim of the legislators.  Walker can't be recalled soon enough.
adversarial_text: Get a clue.  Our governor is the coward.  Money coming in the door from oil revenues drops by over 50%.  So the state budget should be cut by 50%.  But our governor doesn't do the tough job of cutting state fat.  Instead, he finds ways to'reallocate' funds, taking $1100 from every Alaskan to pad his own budget.  And then he tours Assembly meetings playing the 'underdog' card, claiming he's being unfairly targeted by legislators.  Walker can't be recalled soon enough.

original_text: If I was his neighbor I'd want the wack job locked up. I wouldn't need a stray bullet from that idiot blasting into my home with the chance of killing or maiming me or my family. Fricking morons like this get all of us law abiding gun owners painted with the same brush.
adversarial_text: If I were his neighbor, I'd want that individual held accountable. I wouldn't want to risk being caught in the crossfire from someone who can't control their actions, potentially putting my family's lives at risk. It's frustrating when irresponsible behavior like this reflects poorly on law-abiding gun owners everywhere.

original_text: Your proud incompetence is a liability to public health. Have you seen what polio and small pox does to children? You are one pathetic loser.
adversarial_text: Your impressive lack of preparedness poses significant risks to public health. Have you considered the devastating impact of polio and smallpox on children? You're clearly not equipped to handle such challenges.
